tool_description: Dirt bike, ATV, SxS, Jeep, and Snowmobile parks and trails. braapDB is made by riders, for riders. The vast collection of crowdsourced data is constantly evolving thanks to you. Get your free account and API key at http://www.braapDB.com
name: braapDB
title: braapDB

api_list.name: Experience Level
Search For Parks
api_list.description: Search for Parks. Max of 10 results

optional_parameters.name: ExperienceLevel
optional_parameters.description: The Experience Level for the park. Valid inputs are: beginner, intermediate, advanced, or expert

optional_parameters.name: TerrainHas
optional_parameters.description: Park has Terrain Type. Valid inputs are: RhythmSection, Roots, Mud, Sand, Jumps, HillClimbs, HardPack, Gravle, LargeLooseRocks, OtherHazards

optional_parameters.name: IsOpen
optional_parameters.description: If the park is open or not

optional_parameters.name: allowedvehicles
optional_parameters.description: Type of Vehicle Allowed. Valid inputs are Motorcycles, Jeep, SxS, ATV, or Snowmobile

optional_parameters.name: namecontains
optional_parameters.description: Park Name Contains. Note: Must be min of 3 chars

optional_parameters.name: dist
optional_parameters.description: Radius around Lat Lng to search. Default is 25 Miles. If used, Lng and Lat must also be used

optional_parameters.name: lng
optional_parameters.description: Longitude of where to start the search. Decimal degrees -180 to 180. If used, Lat must also be used

optional_parameters.name: lat
optional_parameters.description: Latitude of where to start the search. Decimal degrees -90 to 90 If used, Lng must also be used

api_list.name: Trail
Ride Report
api_list.description: Get a Ride Report by ID

api_list.name: Info Items For Park
api_list.description: Get all the Info Items for this Park

api_list.name: Info Item
api_list.description: Get an Info Item by ID

api_list.name: Ride Reports For Park
api_list.description: Get all the Ride Reports for this Park

api_list.name: Park
Permitted Vehicles
Get Info Items For Trail
api_list.description: Get all Info Items For a Trail

api_list.name: Terrain

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID of the Terrain object to get

api_list.name: InfoLink

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID of the InfoLink to get

api_list.name: GPSPoint

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID of the GPSPoint to get

api_list.name: Trails For Park
api_list.description: Get all the Trails for this Park

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Park ID to get trails for
